resources.string: Show us some likes by tapping the \'LIKE\' Button.
This App helps you to download Videos and animated Gifs from Tweets to your device.

Copy the tweet url of the tweet containing the video or animated gif. Then paste it into the tweet url box. Enter the name you want it stored with (optional). Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!

Select the option "Share a Tweet via ..." from a Tweet option (selected). Then select the app from the list of apps (the tweet link is automatically inserted in the link link box). Enter the name you want to store with (optional). Then press the "Download" button. Enjoy!!!

Enable the automatic button using the switch below the download button. Then use the Twitter app, select the option "Copy the Tweet \" link from a tweet containing the video or gif. The app automatically handles downloading of video or animated GIF.
The tweet contains no video or gif file
The tweet contains no media file
Request Failed: Check your internet connection
Kindly grant the storage permission for App and try again
Request Failed: Check your internet connection
The url entered contains no video or gif file
The url entered contains no media file
Copy tweet URL to start downloading video or gif
